title: Seto no Hanayome Picture Drama
original_name: 否苦炒亜怒羅魔 極道の妻 KEJIME
sinopse: An exclusive picture drama released with the Blu-Ray Box Set of Seto no Hanayome. The first part starts out with gags and the characters drawn in a simplistic chibi style. It's followed by a quick recap and then goes into the main picture drama story.
